ComicInfo.Summary:
Sebastian has an inexplicable encounter with his son. Marla and her cohort search the world’s conflict zones, and are—it appears, sadly—killed in a blast of artillery fire. Tyler, fearful that Sebastian is discovering too much, too fast, sends him on a gory Homework Assignment that he’ll never hope to survive.
Chuck Palahniuk writes the sequel to Fight Club!
